CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. operates as a holding company. The Company, through its subsidiaries, designs and develops gravity and kinetic energy based, long-duration energy storage products. Energy Vault Holdings serves customers worldwide.
